name: The Great Bath of Mohenjo-Daro
description:
This is a virtual exhibit that allows one to explore the Great Bath located in the Indus Valley city of Mohenjo-Daro. Information points are placed around the exhibit that provide additional facts about the city.

Note: A Firefox bug makes the camera act strangely at times. This can be avoided either by using another browser like Chrome or by downloading a desktop build. Additionally, if the movement gets stuck, you might need to reload the page.

The source code for this project can be accessed on GitHub.

Made by Everett for Intro to Archaeology final project, Dec. 2021.
